comment: mash ended up around 156, will be tasty!
2/7/14 pulled 7.25 gal, changed it to a 90 minute boil to get it down to 6ish.
Columbus, cascade and centennial in this
the summit and Amarillo is really fruity and nice before I transferred to the keg. going to be really pleasant. a nice bitterness as well.

so next time small bittering charge at 60 or 90 and less on the 30 minute addition and use not only summit.
Columbus cascade cent Amarillo summit and a touch of simcoe,not sure which to bitter, use the highest alpha?
 IBUs are right on in this one at 68,
bitter with Columbus, flavor with cent ama cas, finish with same and simcoe, dry with sum ama cas? see P from V on hotmail
